pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package is unilib x86_64 only. The dependencies are latest stable and more secure with the latest xorg-server-1.20.x.
For multilib support and feature complete driver, see the amdgpu-pro-lts package instead.
This package is preferred over the amdgpu-pro-lts package for security reasons.
Mesa OpenGL and Pro OpenGL are mutually exclusive.
The open-stack (with Mesa OpenGL) is recommended for consumer products. The pro-stack (with Pro OpenGL) is recommended for Radeon Pro products.

use.flag: Install the Accelerated Media Framework support.
Installs the enhanced amdgpu kernel driver with ROCm API support and updated DRM driver.
Installs the open-stack containing Mesa OpenGL for consumer products.
Install the outdated legacy OpenCL Orca driver.
Install the OpenCL PAL (Platform Abstraction Layer) driver for GCN 5.x GPUs (e.g. Vega) or newer.
Install the Off Screen Mesa library for software rendering (or headless) via the CPU.
Installs the pro-stack containing the Pro OpenGL recommended for Radeon PRO products.
Install the hsakmt library needed for API calls to communicate with the ROCk kernel.
Install VAAPI (Video Acceleration API) acceleration driver.
Install VDPAU (Video Decode and Presentation API for Unix) acceleration driver.
Install the XA state tracker for vmware products.
